rows.label: qst700502_msg0001
rows.name:
To make the requested item, I'll need
a rare ore called Purestone, which can
only be mined at night.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0002
rows.name:
Generally speaking, you might be able
to find it around Hangnail Crossing.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0003
rows.name:
Normally, it blends in so well with
the stone that you can only make it
out in the dark.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0004
rows.name:
I know it's a whopper of a job,
but you should have seen the
desperation in my friend's eyes...

rows.label: qst700502_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm sorry to have to ask this of you,
but I really need your help. I'll do
whatever I can for you in return.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, but keep it to rough stuff like
escorting and fighting. Delicate
jobs aren't really my forte.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0101
rows.name:
Oho! Is that the Purestone you've
got there? Fantastic!

rows.label: qst700502_msg0102
rows.name: I knew you'd get the job done.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0103
rows.name:
All right, all that's left is now is to
make the finished product..."Sweet
Nothings." Sentimental twaddle...

rows.label: qst700502_msg0104
rows.name:
Anyhow, give me a shout when it's
done. In the meantime, I'll try to
smooth things over with the client.

rows.label: qst700502_msg0105
rows.name:
He's had some sleepless nights in
anticipation, the poor lad.
